title: DCM Shriram gets Rs 100 cr sustainable finance from Standard Chartered Bank
description: DCM Shriram Ltd secures Rs 100 crore sustainable finance from Standard Chartered Bank for a compressed bio-gas plant at Ajbapur Sugar Unit, using 'pressmud' as feedstock.
